articles.title: LIVE: 'महाराष्ट्राची श्रावणक्वीन' आज ठरणार
articles.description: नृत्याविष्कार... दिलखेच अभिनय... स्वरांची बरसात... आणि जगातील वर्तमान घडामोडींचे भान... या आणि अशा अनेकविध पातळ्यांवरील परीक्षांमधून महाराष्ट्रातील सौंदर्यवतींचा आज, कस लागणार असून, या परीक्षेतून तावूनसलाखून निघणारी सौंदर्यवतीच 'महाराष्ट्राची श्रावणक्वीन' ठरण…

articles.author: भाषा
articles.title: प्रियंका का केंद्र पर हमला, अर्थव्यवस्था चौपट की
articles.description: भारत न्यूज़: यंका गांधी वाड्रा ने पूछा कि ​केंद्र स्पष्ट करे कि अर्थव्यवस्था को नष्ट करने का जिम्मेदार कौन है? उन्होंने कहा कि अच्छे दिन का भोंपू बजाने वाली सरकार ने अर्थव्यवस्था की हालत पंक्चर कर दी है।

articles.author: Manisha Mandal
articles.title: Saif Ali Khan Lauds Paparazzi For Backing Off From His House To Click His Son Taimur
articles.description: Ever since Taimur Ali Khan has been born he became the favourite star kid of the papz and slowly become a sensation on the internet. Both Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor expressed their worry over his son becoming the sensation and most loved kid on the inte…
articles.content: Taimur Ali Khan became the favourite star kid of the paps right after he was born. It took him no time to become a sensation on the internet. Both Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor expressed their worry over their son becoming the most loved kid on the interne… [+900 chars]

articles.title: Manchester United held to 1-1 draw by 10-man Southampton
articles.description: Manchester United's patchy start to the Premier League season continued with a 1-1 draw at 10-man Southampton after a Jannik Vestergaard header cancelled out a brilliant Daniel James goal for the visitors on Saturday.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Good Pawar doesn't have son who jumps ship, says daughter Sule
articles.description: Sons of some NCP leaders have recently joined the BJP and Sena and each of these instances have been accompanied by speculation that the fathers were also on their way to the ruling camp.
articles.content:
Navi Mumbai: NCP Lok Sabha MP Supriya 
Sule on Saturday said she jokingly told party chief and father Sharad 
Pawar he was "fortunate" to not 
have a 
sonwhojumpsship, taking along with him his father on some other party's platform in pursuit of a career.… [+1990 chars]
